duties_responsibilities.duty: Design & support software solutions for manufacturing processes
Ensure compliance with cyber security requirements governed by DOD and NIST
Performing cause and corrective action activities to permanently eliminate defects
Using software skills improve existing processes implementing Digital Transformation techniques
Follow company software development lifecycle to design, code, configure, test, debug, and document system and application programs
Develop SPC tools for process control
Create high level software solutions to interface with machine level control

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree in Computer Science, Electrical, Automated Systems, or related Engineering (other technical degrees may be considered)
